thawakalika kathikacharyawarayaku lesa pathwimakuth labuna. 1963 desambar masedi mage pathwima sthira wuna.oya kale sugathapala da silwa guruthuma engalanthaye yonk wishwa widyale wag widya anshaye uganwamin sitiya. 1965 di mata yonk wishwa widyalen shishyathwayak labuna.pashchath upadhiya sandaha mama sinhalaye kathika basa ha likhitha basa pilibanda thulanathmaka wag widya adhyayanayak kala. 1968 di lankawata aapasu aawe ostin kar ekakuth aran.
